backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, mod settings, item spawner, and process selector with authorization checks and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten file summaries describing roles of frontend components, hooks, state modules, assets, and build guides.
frontend/ANDROID_APK_BUILD.md: Guide explaining how to build and install an Android TWA/APK version of the app, including Meta Questâ€“specific notes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with OKLCH theme variables, dark mode values, and VR-specific adjustments.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the app with VR-friendly viewport settings and PWA manifest link.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, startup settings, theme colors, and shortcuts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying VR-browser styling, authentication gating, dynamic backgrounds, and rendering the mod menu.
frontend/src/components/ApkBuildInstruct: UI dialog that displays detailed TWA/APK build instructions for packaging the web app into an Android APK.
frontend/src/components/AppToAppLauncher: Provides a UI for launching an external app via deep links, with environment checks and error handling for Android/Quest.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles authentication flow using Internet Identity, including login, profile checking, and gating access to children.
frontend/src/components/DownloadsPanel.t: Shows APK download availability, Meta Quest guidance, and an overlay for build instructions.
frontend/src/components/ModStatusBar.tsx: Displays active mod statuses as badges based on current mod settings.
Loads and filters a prefab catalog, showing searchable prefab entries with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/ProcessSelectorP: UI panel that loads available processes, displays the selected process, and allows refreshing and changing the target process.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for creating a new user profile with name input and default settings, saving via backend mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppToAppLink.ts: Manages a persistently stored deep link string with setters and a reset-to-default option.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useItemSpawner.ts: Fetches item spawner data, adds items via backend mutation, and tracks local spawn logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useModSettings.ts: Loads and updates mod settings by syncing with backend and storing some client-only settings locally.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefabCatalog.ts: Fetches a static JSON catalog of prefabs from assets using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProcessSelector.ts: Loads and updates the selected process using backend queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for user profiles, item spawner, process selector, and available processes using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRuntimeEnv.ts: Detects platform and browser characteristics from the user agent and exposes runtime environment flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, background utilities, and mobile/VR browser optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ModMenuPage.tsx: UI page for the mod menu including settings controls, item spawning, process selection, and status display.
frontend/src/state/modSettings.ts: Defines the mod settings model, defaults, and helpers for clamping and storing settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and persisting URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, typography, animations, and desert-themed palettes.
project_state.json: Project metadata detailing Meta Quest 3S compatibility goals, features, and requirements.
